metadata.name: SNAKE'S HEAD
metadata.description:
Some consider it as childish Photography, some others don't even bother to get involved with because it's too "easy" as they say...!  
But really is it? 
You cannot really control the smoke while shooting so whatever the result is you've got to work with it.  
I personally see things, figures, and objects though my smoke images. To emphasize on them, I'm trying to paint them with different colors most of the times.  
Maybe we don't see the same thing...it doesn't really matter! Just let your imagination free...

---
